CodeList.Name: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities like heavy lifting, digging, aerobics, or fast bicycling?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Days Vigorous Physical Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities like heavy lifting, digging, aerobics, or fast bicycling?: No vigorous physical activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - No Vigorous Physical Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - How much time did you usually spend doing vigorous physical activities on one of those days?: hours per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Vigorous Physical Hours per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - How much time did you usually spend doing vigorous physical activities on one of those days?: minutes per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Vigorous Physical Minutes per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - How much time did you usually spend doing vigorous physical activities on one of those days?: Don't know/Not sure.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Time Vigorous Don't Know/Not Sure

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate physical activities like carrying light loads, bicycling at a regular pace, or doubles tennis?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Days Moderate Physical Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate physical activities like carrying light loads, bicycling at a regular pace, or doubles tennis?: No moderate physical activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - No Moderate Physical Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - How much time did you usually spend doing moderate physical activities on one of those days?: hours per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Moderate Physical Hours per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - How much time did you usually spend doing moderate physical activities on one of those days?: minutes per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Moderate Physical Minutes per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - How much time did you usually spend doing moderate physical activities on one of those days?: Don't know/Not sure.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Time Moderate Don't Know/Not Sure

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you walk for at least 10 minutes at a time?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Days Walk at Least 10 Minutes

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you walk for at least 10 minutes at a time?: No walking.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - No Walking

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - How much time did you usually spend walking on one of those days?: hours per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Walking Hours per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - How much time did you usually spend walking on one of those days?: minutes per day.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Time Walking Don't Know/Not Sure

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, how much time did you spend sitting on a weekday?: hours per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Self-administered Format Version - Sitting Weekday Hours per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, how much time did you spend sitting on a weekday?: minutes per day.
